Sentencas: In order to verify the validity of the simulation and to investigate the gaseous diffusion from the outlet of the anode, anodic gas concentration measurements of a seal-less disk-type solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) were carried out using quadrupole mass spectrometer (QMS).
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Simultaneous gas sampling was conducted from the five sampling ports made at the anode separator.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The uniformity of the radial gas flow in the anode was confirmed by analyzing the gas from four sampling ports located at a concentric circle.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: H-2, H2O and N-2 concentration profiles were measured and simulated under various fuel utilization (U-f) conditions and changing the gas flow rate.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The diffusion of N-2 into the anode was found to become less with increasing Uf owing to the lesser diffusivity of N-2 in H2O than in H-2.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: From the simulation, the existence of the reverse current, i.e., electrolysis current, in the outlet region was predicted.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It was confirmed that the existence of the electrolysis current is possible by measuring the concentration of the gas in the anode under electrolysis operations.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The comparison of V-i characteristics measured and simulated revealed that the effect of the concentration polarization is not significant and suggested the validity of the assumption made for the simulation.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell
Experimental investigation of anodic gaseous concentration of a practical seal-less solid oxide fuel cell
